formattedAddress: 504 Grand St # M5, New York, NY 10002, USA
adrFormatAddress: 504 Grand St # M5, New York, NY 10002-4182, USA

originalText.text: Took my two kids 8 and 12 here to get a cleaning. They technician couldn’t get the xrays for neither one and kept saying that the kids were not holding the mouth piece correctly. The mouth piece was way too big and was hurting them. They left with scratches inside their mouth. During the cleaning she was very messy and didnt know how to work the equipment correctly i felt as if it was a joke or something i knew that this was a new dentist to the area but i did not expect this. We will not be returning and its so unfortunate because i was so happy we had a dentist in the area.

originalText.text: I was looking for a new dentist and decided to try LIV after seeing them on Facebook. I’m glad I followed through with it too! The 7-point oral exam was incredibly thorough. I also appreciated the use of low radiation x-rays and digital sensors to ensure superior treatment. I went there for their promotional cleaning and found my new forever dentist.

originalText.text: Such a great experience! I came in for a cleaning and Dr. Corrine was very gentle and answered all my questions. Highly recommend to anyone looking for a new primary dentist in the city.

text.text: Such a great experience! I came in for a cleaning and Dr. Corrine was very gentle and answered all my questions. Highly recommend to anyone looking for a new primary dentist in the city.

originalText.text: My visit to the dentist today was very positive and the cleaning and the staff were very warm and informative. I enjoyed the visit.

originalText.text: The staff, I mean EVERYONE in this office is awesome dr Corinne and Samantha were amazing from stRt to finish!! Number one in my book!
